hero.description: Upload your photos, select garments and let AI do the rest.

step1.title: Upload your model and garments
step1.description: Upload photos of your models with a neutral background along with the garments you want to try. Our AI automatically detects poses, facial features and clothing, supports multiple formats and processes everything in seconds.

step2.title: Adjust style options
step2.description: Customize every detail: choose from casual, formal or urban styles, define the season, select full body or half body and adjust lighting. You'll have full control over the final result with just a few clicks.

step3.title: Generate professional results
step3.description: In just seconds, get high-quality images ready to use. Download, share with your team or clients and save to your personal gallery. Each result maintains the essence of the model while applying garments realistically and naturally.
